title: What people in Austria need to know about new unemployment rules from July 2025
description:
New rules have come into force for unemployed people in Austria. Here's what’s changed for AMS re-registration and online requirements.

Austria has introduced new rules for unemployed people from July 1st 2025, changing how to report to the Public Employment Service (AMS) after a break in receiving...
